Package com.CZ2002.consoles

Class ConsoleDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.CZ2002.consoles.ConsoleDisplay
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneralConsole, MenuConsole, OrderConsole, ReservationConsole, SalesRevenueConsole
public abstract class ConsoleDisplay extends Object
The ConsoleDisplay class represents the interface that a user will interact with.

All ConsoleDisplay implementations maintain their own reference to the IMainManager and must implement displayConsoleOptions() and handleConsoleOptions().

  • Method Details

    • displayConsoleOptions

      public abstract int displayConsoleOptions()
      The method to call to produce output to be shown to the user.

      The last option to be displayed to the user should be the 'back' option or something equivalent.

      Returns:
      the number of options to be displayed

    • handleConsoleOptions

      public abstract MenuView handleConsoleOptions() throws InvalidStaffException, ParseException, InvalidSalesRevenueQueryException
      The method to call to accept input from the user.

      This method then performs the necessary transition of control from this ConsoleDisplay to another or to a ICommand instance.

      Returns:
      the MenuView that represents the state of the interface
      Throws:
      InvalidStaffException
      ParseException
      InvalidSalesRevenueQueryException
